data.text: @ANI Future would depend on the hospital admission,  not cases numbers

@ANI Governments should now leave Covid to people. There should be no restrictions now onwards. We are wearing masks, we are vaccinated, we have faced 1.5 years in lockdown. If still corona is here, then it is here to stay and so we have to learn to live with it..!!
@ANI Masks ko chodke aise bhi koi restrictions follow nai kar rahe the
@ANI Ek kaam to sahi kia aakhir..
